examples.example: 我收到了远方朋友寄来的一封充满关怀的信。

translate.english: I received a letter full of care sent by a friend from afar.

examples.example: 我写了一封热情洋溢的感谢信给帮助过我的人。

translate.english: I wrote a passionate thank-you letter to those who have helped me.

examples.example: 我给妈妈写了一封表达爱意的信。

translate.english: I wrote a letter expressing love to my mother.
